title: Crossroads: Social Services and Help in Nanaimo
name: Crossroads: Social Services and Help in Nanaimo
description: A map of agencies and services to assist people facing poverty law issues in Nanaimo.

properties.name: AIDS Vancouver Island-Nanaimo
properties.description: AIDS Vancouver Island provides integrated services to individuals with HIV/AIDS and/or hepatitis C, tuberculosis and other communicable diseases. AVI provides education and prevention information to schools, the broader community and target populations.

properties.name: Harris House Health Clinic
properties.description: Provides confidential health care, harm reduction supplies and support to individuals at risk of HepB/HepC/HIV and sexually transmitted infections.

properties.name: Canadian Mental Health Association
properties.description: The CMHA's programs assist with employment, housing, early intervention for youth, peer support, recreation services for people with mental illness, stress reduction workshops and public education campaigns for the community.

properties.name: AVI Health Centre
properties.description: The AVI Health Centre is a private not for profit health care center that provides medical treatment and counselling to people struggling with addiction to opiates.We offer methadone treatment and personalized counselling services for people struggling with addiction to opiates. We also offer education, treatment and support for clients living with Hepatitis C and/or HIV.Harm reduction services such as condoms, information and counselling on disease and sexually transmitted infections, prevention and management, and safer drug use are available.We serve as a point of health education and referral to other community services that may benefit our clients.

properties.name: Surfside Recovery House
properties.description: Six week drug and alcohol program for men.

properties.name: Habitat For Humanity Mid-Vancouver Island Society
properties.description: Promotes home ownership by building "simple, decent, safe and affordable" homes for those who are unable to qualify for a conventional mortgage. Affordable because of an interest-free mortgage and no down payment required. Homes are built by volunteer labour and donated materials.

properties.name: Nanaimo Affordable Housing Society
properties.description: Tenant Office:Nanaimo Affordable Housing Society develops and manages housing and support services for families and single people with low incomes and people with disabilties.

properties.name: Nanaimo Affordable Housing Society
properties.description: Tenant Office:Nanaimo Affordable Housing Society develops and manages housing and support services for families and single people with low incomes and people with disabilties.

properties.name: Salvation Army Thrift Stores
properties.Categories: Thrift Store, Clothing, Furniture and Household Goods

properties.name: Salvation Army Thrift Stores
properties.Categories: Thrift Store, Clothing, Furniture and Household Goods

properties.name: Island Deaf & Hard Of Hearing Centre
properties.description: DHHC provides counselling and support services to people dealing with a hearing loss.

properties.name: Nanaimo Brain Injury Society
properties.description: Provides assistance to persons with an acquired brain injury, their families and/or caregivers through eduction, advocacy and community rehabilitation support. Also educates the public about brain injury prevention.

properties.name: Nanaimo Citizen Advocacy
properties.description: Nanaimo Citizen Advocacy Association assists and advocates for individuals who find the system unapproachable because they are unable to understand or participate in the completion of different types of forms or clearly understand process.

properties.name: Alcoholics Anonymous
properties.description: Alcoholics Anonymous is a fellowship of men and women who share their experience, strength and hope with each other that they may solve their common problem and help others to recover from alcoholism.

properties.name: Immigrant Welcome Centre
properties.description: We provide services to immigrants. We offer English language classes, employment and direct settlement assistance as well as other related services.

properties.name: Haven Society
properties.description: Haven Society provides services to women, children, youth and families who have experienced violence.

properties.name: Loaves & Fishes Food Bank
properties.description: Family and/or survival bag distribution once per week. ID required.

properties.name: The Salvation Army Meal Program
properties.description: Meals 7 days per week.Check website for details
